extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a Network Defender?

extracted_playbook.title: Provide Regular Training on Phishing
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct regular training and exercises for users, specifically related to phishing emails, as phishing accounts for the majority of initial access intrusion events.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Implement phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication (MFA) to the greatest extent possible to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Reduce Risk of Credential Compromise
extracted_playbook.description: Place domain admin accounts in the protected users group to prevent caching of password hashes locally and force Kerberos AES authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Operating Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to Windows Server 2019 or greater and Windows 10 or greater to utilize enhanced security features not present in older operating systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Zero Trust Network Architecture
extracted_playbook.description: Prioritize implementing a modern Zero Trust network architecture that leverages secure cloud services, upgrades applications and infrastructure, centralizes cybersecurity data, and invests in technology and personnel.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a Software Manufacturer?

extracted_playbook.title: Embed Security in Product Architecture
extracted_playbook.description: Integrate security throughout the entire software development lifecycle (SDLC) to enhance product security.

extracted_playbook.title: Eliminate Default Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Require administrators to set a strong password during installation and configuration to eliminate default passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Design for Compromise Resilience
extracted_playbook.description: Design products so that the compromise of a single security control does not compromise the entire system. Use ACLs and narrowly provision user privileges by default.

extracted_playbook.title: Mandate MFA for Privileged Users
extracted_playbook.description: Mandate phishing-resistant MFA for privileged users and make it a default feature rather than opt-in.

extracted_playbook.title: Reduce Hardening Guide Size
extracted_playbook.description: Focus on making systems secure by default and implement routine nudges built into the product to guide administrators.

cve_id: CISA Mitigations for Network Defenders and Software Manufacturers
